long_description: Hike and stay cool in the women's adidas EDO Functional T-Shirt with Cocona(R) for evaporative cooling and odor control. Cotton/merino wool on the front won't snag in contact with rock if you're climbing; the polyester back wicks moisture. Made from activated carbon from recycled coconut shells, Cocona(R) is a natural technology applied to fabrics and yarns to accelerate evaporative cooling and manage odor. Cocona treatment will not wash off or wear out. Soft merino wool is naturally warm, breathable and water resistant. The women's adidas EDO Functional T-Shirt features graphic art on the sides and pre-rolled sleeves.
short_description: Hike and stay cool in the women's adidas EDO Functional T-Shirt with Cocona(R) for evaporative cooling and odor control.
